name: Cull Your Frustum!
description:
Hello there new dev interns!

Welcome to the studio! Now that you've settled in, I thought I'd explain what you'll be working on for your 3 weeks with us. Our technical lead has been building a new game prototype, and we'll need your help with what he called "realtime manual optimisation". Attached on this page are the project files for download - apparently he has left documentation within, but he gave this message to pass on:

"WASD or arrow keys to move in the right view. Mouse to clean up in the left view."

I don't know what the means but I'm sure you'll be able to figure it out :)

So you can get cracking on that for now - give me a shout later and I'll show you where you can find some lunch. I hope you enjoy your time with us!

- Anna from HR
